name: Astravity
description:
Hi! This is my very first game that I've made while learning Unity and C#. Constructive criticism will help me for future creations, so thanks in advance! 

Also, this game is not done! I am going to fix a text cramping error as well as add 3 enemies in the not-so-distant future!

I chose to do an asteroids type game because it required 0 animation skills and little art skills, which are areas I am lacking in.
